hotels.title: Philippines Luxury in the Heart of Makati with Eight Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the pinnacle of five-star luxury in the heart of one of the Philippines' most prestigious business and lifestyle districts. This refined oasis in Metro Manilla offers an outdoor pool, Pool Bar, world-class spa and a variety of upscale and casual dining options. Unwind at the speakeasy-inspired Long Bar or marvel at the stunning sunset from the Mistral Rooftop Bar. Savour a global culinary experience at Spectrum, an all-day dining restaurant with an international buffet, or indulge in authentic French cuisine at Mireio, a Provencal-inspired brasserie on the 9th floor. Just steps away, explore the lively Greenbelt Shopping Centre, lush city parks and the Ayala Museum.
